autoshop.message:
Data from {link;fnbr}
Vote for this bot here: {link;vote_link}

autoshop_no_access.message: I was unable to access the `autoshop` channel ({channel;channel}) you set in your server `{server_name}`. I have deleted the channel from my database

setchannel_error.message: {user;author} You must specify the type to set this channel to one of: {types}

resetchannels_error.message: {user;author} Sorry that type does not exist

setprefix_confirm.message: {user;author} are you sure you want to change your prefix to `{prefix}`, example: `{prefix}help`?

setprefix_error.message: Sorry, an error occured whilst changing your prefix

stats_notfound_link.message: User not found using your linked account: `{username}` (`{platform}`). You might need to update your linked account using `{prefix}link [username]`

stats_notfound_console.message: . Console players require a linked epic games account to view their stats. In order to link your epic games account visit {link;fortnite} and login. You must use your epic games username to view stats.

stats_error_link.message: Error getting stats with your linked account: `{username}` (`{platform}`). You might need to update your linked account using the `{prefix}link [username]` command.

stats_short_link.message: Your linked account name `{username}` (`{platform}`) is too short please relink using `{prefix}link [username]`

stats_short.message: {user;author} you must link your account using `{prefix}link [username]`, or just enter your name in this command.

stats_command.message: If your trying to use a command your prefix is: `{prefix}` e.g. `{prefix}setprefix ".rb "`

link_success.message: {user;author} Your account is now linked to `{username}` (`{platform}`)

link_error.message: {user;author} Sorry I encountered an error while linking your account, please try again later

link_short.message: {user;author} Please provide a username to link your account

unlink_error.message: {user;author} Sorry I encountered an error unlinking your account, please try again later

setbackground_error.message: {user;author} Unable to set backgrounds you must include a type. One of: {types}

news_error.message: Sorry {user;author} I was unable to get the news, please try again later

servers_error.message: {user;author} sorry I was unable to get the current fortnite server status, please try again later

error.message: {user;author} Sorry an error occured, please try again later

channel_administrator.message: {user;author} You must be an administrator to change channel settings

setlocale_error.message: There was an error changing your language

botinfo_help.message: Print the current status of RoyaleBot. `{prefix}botinfo`.

setchannel_help.message: Set the channel to a specific role, such as automated messages. `{prefix}setchannel [argument]`. `[argument]` must be one of {types}.

resetchannels_help.message: Reset set channels for this server. `{prefix}resetchannels [argument]`. `[argument]` must be one of {types}.

channels_help.message: Print set channel for the current server. `{prefix}channels`.

setprefix_help.message: Set the command prefix for this server. `{prefix}setprefix [prefix]`. If you would like your prefix to end with a space you need to put "" around it, e.g. `{prefix}setprefix ".rb "`.

setlocale_help.message: Change the language for the current server. `{prefix}setlocale`.

shop_help.message: Print an image of todays shop. `{prefix}shop`.

stats_help.message: Print an image of a fortnite player's stats. `{prefix}stats (cs)? [platform]? [playername]`. If you do not set `[platform]` it will default to pc, `[playername]` is not required if you have linked your account or replace it with an @mention to another user with a linked account.

upcoming_help.message: Print an image of upcoming fortnite items. `{prefix}upcoming`.

setbackground_help.message: Change the background for images generated by RoyaleBot. `{prefix}setbackground [type] [url 1] [url 2]...`. `[type]` must be one of {types}. If you would like to set multiple backgrounds for one type seperate the urls with a space.

news_help.message: Print the current news for Fortnite Battle Royale. `{prefix} news`.

status_help.message: Print the current server status for Fortnite. `{prefix}status`

link_help.message: Link your Fortnite account for easy stats retrieval. `{prefix}link [platform]? [playername]`. If you do not include `[platform]` it will default to pc.
